Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from measles virus(MV) fusion (F) protein)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.8700906]measles virus(MV):protection of HEp2 cell from viral cytopathic effect(CPE)(EC50=85.3 μg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.8700906]No significant cytotoxic against HEp2 cells(CC50>100 μM).
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Peptides from conserved regions of paramyxovirus fusion (F) proteins are potent inhibitors of viral fusion.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1996 Mar 5;93(5)2186-91.
Literature.Author: Lambert DM, Barney S, Lambert AL, Guthrie K, Medinas R, Davis DE, Bucy T, Erickson J, Merutka G, Petteway SR Jr.
